justification: “Phishing discrimination task… participants were asked to… make a judgement about whether each item was legitimate or a phish… Overall accuracy in the task was calculated as the percentage of correct classifications.”

“Propensity to Morally Disengage Scale measures each of the eight strategies used to morally disengage proposed by Bandura (1996)… This measure has been validated for use in adults in organizational contexts.”
“To measure employee satisfaction and loyalty, we used the Employee Satisfaction and Loyalty… This measure has been validated for use in a number of organizations, industries, and nations.”
“New General Self Efficacy Scale… This scale has well-established psychometric properties (Chen et al., 2010).”
“Participants… then asked to rate their confidence in that judgement on a scale from 0… to 100 with no incremental tick marks between them.”
